abstract: A secretive network of Republican donors, which included chieftains from the hedge fund and private equity industries, media moguls and wealthy individuals, is heading to the Palm Springs area for a long weekend in January, not to relax after a hard-fought election, but to plan for the next one.
snippet: A secretive network of Republican donors, which included chieftains from the hedge fund and private equity industries, media moguls and wealthy individuals, is heading to the Palm Springs area for a long weekend in January, not to relax after a ha...
lead_paragraph: A secretive network of Republican donors, which includes chiefs from the hedge fund and private equity industries, media moguls and wealthy individuals, is heading to the Palm Springs area for a long weekend in January, but it will not be to relax after a hard-fought election — it will be to plan for the next one.

headline.main: Secretive G.O.P. Donors Are Planning Ahead
